summary: SummaryIT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Illumination with SPF 50+ works as a full-coverage foundation, anti-aging serum, and SPF 50+ physical sunscreen. It features micronized light-reflecting pigments for glowing skin with a natural finish and hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsFull coverage foundation, hydrating anti-aging serum, and SPF 50+ physical sunscreen in one product.Features micronized light-reflecting pigments for glowing skin with a natural finishProvides hydration while diffusing the appearance of skin imperfectionsReduces the appearance of acne scarring, wrinkles, redness on skin, dark circles under eyes and large poresWon't crease or crackClinically tested hydrationKey IngredientsInfused with hydrolyzed collagen, peptides, niacin, hyaluronic acid, antioxidants and vitaminsSPF 50+ physical sunscreenResearch ResultsIn just 10 days:96% saw softer, smoother skin***85% saw an improvement in the appearance of wrinkles***77% said pores appeared smaller***Immediately: 100% showed increased skin hydration****Clinically measured result***Results observed in a clinical studyItem 2287681How To UseApply 1-2 pumps of CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ to clean skin using your favorite IT Cosmetics makeup brush. Can be used as your moisturizer, anti-aging serum, concealer, foundation and sunscreen, based on your coverage needs.For best results, apply a smooth, even layer to your face, neck, and d√©collet√© for complexion perfection.Beauty tip: Focus on parts of your face that may need the most coverage first, such as under your eyes, around your nose and mouth, chin and center of forehead - all of which typically require color correction for acne or uneven skin tone.IngredientsWater, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Stearic Acid, Cyclohexasiloxane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexyl Laurate, Calcium Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethyl Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Adenosine, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Oil, Linalool, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Glycerin, Citral, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Steareth-20, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, Colloidal Oatmeal, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Chrysin, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Citric Acid, Biotin, Silk Extract, Hydrolyzed Silk, [May Contain] Mica, Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxidev283863/1.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps of CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ to clean skin using your favorite IT Cosmetics makeup brush. Can be used as your moisturizer, anti-aging serum, concealer, foundation and sunscreen, based on your coverage needs.For best results, apply a smooth, even layer to your face, neck, and d√©collet√© for complexion perfection.Beauty tip: Focus on parts of your face that may need the most coverage first, such as under your eyes, around your nose and mouth, chin and center of forehead - all of which typically require color correction for acne or uneven skin tone.

reviews.headline: I would like this product
reviews.comments: having been using that product for a long time

reviews.headline: I really like the product
reviews.comments: I really like this product and have been buying IT for a few years but unfortunately the cost will probably stop me from buying it again and I will have to go back to Revlon or Cover Girl.

reviews.headline: Absolutely my favorite!
reviews.comments: I've tried other well known brands & nothing compares. I've used this for years! The illumination in this product makes the skin look radiant! I only use it because I have to cover my rosacea and blotchiness that my rosacea creates. Excellent coverage for being a CC cream. Other brands that are matte don't make my skin glow like this does. I have textured combination skin too and this works best for me. Also, a little goes a long way with this product! Love it!

reviews.headline: I have been using this product for years
reviews.comments: I love using this as it allows me to have coverage without having a heavy presence on my face. I always look natural and not made up.

reviews.headline: Yes!
reviews.comments: A wonderful product that I have been using for years!

reviews.headline: Yes!
reviews.comments: Wonderful product and I have been using it for years!

reviews.headline: Luminous with great coverage! Ideal for dry skin!
reviews.comments: I always get compliments on my skin when I wear this! It has been my go-to for many years! I prefer this to the other CC Creams as it blurs imperfections and gives a gorgeous, luminous finish (not shiny, think "lit from within"), great coverage and has SPF 50 to boot!

reviews.headline: Best ivetried
reviews.comments: I've been using this for many years. I don't like wearing makeup but this doesn't give me that makeup feel. Definitely recommend

reviews.headline: It Cosmetics
reviews.comments: Wonderful!

reviews.headline: I have been buying this product.   And several other IT prod
reviews.comments:
All are great
  I am asked what I use on my face by several ladies.

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments: I have this a 4 because it seems to be darker on my skin than the tube showed. I buy the illuminating one for a shine however this seems to dry out face and there is no shine.  I hope they haven't changed the complex of the makeup. Then I will have to go to another supplier.

reviews.headline: Too glittery and not enough coverage
reviews.comments: Wish I had read the bad reviews before purchase, because this has way too much shimmer/glitter in it. I loved the texture on my skin but when I looked at my hands/face afterwards in the sun I saw tons of glitter everywhere, super unnecessary for daily wear and doesn't proved a lot of coverage.

reviews.headline: YES!
reviews.comments: Great project, been using for many years.  Started when I had Rosacea.

reviews.headline: Love this product!!
reviews.comments: I wanted to try this one for the illumination and I love it!! üòÅ

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this product.
reviews.comments: Use year after year.

reviews.headline: My go to for foundation.
reviews.comments: Love the coverage.

reviews.headline: Cult favorite
reviews.comments: This is my second time purchasing this and it's going to be my go to for now on.  I'm nearing 40, so the illumination is so nice for my age.  In the past I've leaned toward a more matte look, but noticed that fine lines were less noticeable the more Dewey I did my makeup.  This is a great base for trending towards a more Dewey look but not looking like an oil slick. My cream blushes and bronzers layer beautifully with it.

reviews.headline: So good‚Ä¶.
reviews.comments: I used this CC cream when it first came out; I was much younger then and so was my skin. Fast forward to now and I have totally different skin needs. I love the high SPF; as a stage 4 skin cancer survivor and proud natural redhead, I know and understand the need for it. It looks wonderful on my skin and doesn't settle into every pore around my nose and those pesky fine lines that are starting to show up. I love the glow it gives me and that it still looks good at the end of the day. It's a win for me. I was hesitant to give it another try, but I'm so glad I did.

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: My skin looks glowing and beautiful.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry skin. This is the only foundation that doesnt dry my skin out and settle into every crack. Give a great glow.

faceoff_positive.comments: A while back I received a sample of the original CC+ cream and fell in love. I mean serious love. I'm a life long customer now. When I ran out of the regular CC+ I decided to try the Illumination because I would like to have a "glow." The Illumination cream is very shimmery. I knew I wasn't all the way happy with it, but one day I found my old sample of the regular and used it and the difference is huge. I wish there was a product mid-way between the two. I'd like 2/3 regular and 1/3 illumination, ideally. It's just really shimmery and I feel that it somewhat highlights the fine lines around my mouth and eyes. I'm still giving it 4 stars because the coverage and formula is great; I just wish it had less shimmer or a different sort of "glow" to it than what it has.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love the "Your Skin But Better" Formula

faceoff_negative.comments: I have the regular version of this product in the light color but it was too dark for me so I wanted to buy the lighter color, fair, thinking it would match me. I have dry skin so when I saw this illuminating version I got excited. I bought the shade fair but it was way too dark for me (see pic below). Honestly to me I felt like this fair shade should have been labeled as tan or medium it was no where near fair, I was very disappointed.
faceoff_negative.headline: Horrible Shade Range
